location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3156 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter relates to previous correspondence from Jones, informing the Government that the British Agent at Muscat had informed him that the man responsible for kidnapping a Somali girl had been apprehended. Anderson writes that the Government approves of the communication from the British Agent.
